text: Sylvie and Bruno is a novel by Lewis Carroll. It was published in 1889 by Macmillan. Its companion novel Sylvie and Bruno Concluded was published in 1893 by Macmillan. The first volume is set in the real world, but the second volume is set in fairyland. The books were not so well received as the Alice books. == Related pages == *Alice in Wonderland *Through the Looking-Glass Category:Books by Lewis Carroll Category:1889 books
title: Sylvie and Bruno
